title: URF BUG - Jinx Ult
body: So i was in an URF and my cooldown went to default for Jinx. This happened about 3 times that game.

replies.body: happends sometimes with all champions who have skillshot ultimates
It happens on every champion every now and then, it's a bug of urf not of jinx.
Ok, Jinx is the only champ I noticed it on
